      Description:  There is a complaint regarding the product which I received recently from PharmEasy “ acne UV advanced light protection, sunscreen” it is clearly visible that both the products is not similar as I am using this product from past six months and I have used a lot of tubes for this product and the product which I ordered. Please figure out the problem with this and get the refund for the same product.  The first picture contains the both the product, the product which I already use and the product which I received.  As you can see in the second picture, the texture of the cream which I received from the PharmEasy app  Andy third picture, you can see the texture of the cream. It is very silicon smooth enough. They both are very different. In fact in the colour in the texture and the product I received is quite sticky to my skin.

Subject: Complain 22248372

Description:
There is a complaint regarding the product which I received recently from PharmEasy “ acne UV advanced light protection, sunscreen” it is clearly visible that both the products is not similar as I am using this product from past six months and I have used a lot of tubes for this product and the product which I ordered. The quality is totally different as you can see in the picture the product I already have with myself is smooth enough in the silicon texture, but the the product which I received from pharmacy is not similar to the product I use. Please figure out the problem with this and get the refund for the same product.  The first picture contains the both the product, the product which I already use and the product which I received.  As you can see in the second picture, the texture of the cream which I received from the PharmEasy app  Andy third picture, you can see the texture of the cream. It is very silicon smooth enough. They both are very different. In fact in the colour in the texture and the product I received is quite sticky to my skin.

notes.body: Hello Anvita,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with regards to your order #655087363247808512-80341, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.     As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of the ACNE UV ADVANCED LIGHT PROTECTION SPF 50+ PA++++ SUNSCREEN GEL 50 GM   on 07th December 2025. Please be informed, items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.     Please note that the medicine will be collected within 24 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 48 business hours. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your bank account within 5-7 business days.     We appreciate your patience in the meantime.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Anvita,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with regards to your order #655087363247808512-80341, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of the ACNE UV ADVANCED LIGHT PROTECTION SPF 50+ PA++++ SUNSCREEN GEL 50 GM   on 07th December 2025. Please be informed, items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.
 
Please note that the medicine will be collected within 24 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 48 business hours. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your bank account within 5-7 business days.

We appreciate your patience in the meantime.
 
We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.
 
For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

If you require any further assistance, please feel free to reach out to us through the support channels available on our app or website under the “Need Help” section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy.

With regards to your order #655134735562678272-75356, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.     As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 04th December 2025. We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. notes.body_html:
Hello Kapil Kalra,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #655134735562678272-75356, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 04th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

Hello,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I am sorry to hear that you wish to deactivate your PharmEasy account. 

I have forwarded your account deactivation request to our escalations team. Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed our team will reach out within 24 to 48 hours to complete the account deactivation process on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. 

If yes, an OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you to the team, they will go ahead and block the customer's account.

Your patience and understanding are highly appreciated in the meantime.

Regards,
Neeha

notes.body: Hello Kalpar,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I am sorry to hear that you wish to deactivate your PharmEasy account.      I have forwarded your account deactivation request to our escalations team. Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated, then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed, our team will reach out within 24 to 48 hours to complete the account deactivation process on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation.      If yes, an OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you to the team, they will go ahead and block the customer's account.     Your patience and understanding are highly appreciated in the meantime.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Kalpar,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I am sorry to hear that you wish to deactivate your PharmEasy account. 

I have forwarded your account deactivation request to our escalations team. Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated, then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed, our team will reach out within 24 to 48 hours to complete the account deactivation process on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. 

If yes, an OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you to the team, they will go ahead and block the customer's account.

Your patience and understanding are highly appreciated in the meantime.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

PharmEasy

notes.body_html:
Hello Shakil,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #654464342128566272-23424, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 04th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Syed,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with regards to your order #653360168389287936-21834, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.     As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of theDR BAKSHI'S BAKSON HOMOEOPATHY PILGO TABLET 75   on 04th December2025. Please be informed, items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.     Please note that the medicine will be collected within 48 hours from the day the request is raised. helpdesk_ticket.description:
This is to bring you into notice that I ordered gardasil vaccine which was
delivered on 21st November 2025 for my hpv vaccination which was done on
22nd November 2025. The pharmeasy team sent a nurse for the administration
of the same. It was clearly written on the injection thay it should be
administered intramuscular only. But the nurse insisted and gave the
vaccine subcutaneously on the tummy portion near the belly . When I
contacted the nurse who was from venus superspeciality hospital , vadodara
, for complaining for the same issue , she told that this is only the way
we administer this vaccine to every patient please don't worry and for
further any questions ask your gynaecologist.But this technique of
administration is totally wrong. It was Clearly written on the injection as
well as the pn pharmeasy app  that it should be given only intramuscular.
And now when asked my doctor she told this dose won't be effective as it
was given subcutaneously, it has to be given intramuscular for its
effectiveness and she advised me to repeat the dose.
As this vaccines are very costly , not everyone can afford it. Someone's
mistake can ruin someone's else's life.
Now what should I do?
Either deliver me the same vaccine without any money otherwise refund the
total amount to my original payment method at any circumstances, anyhow.

Thankyou

--

helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
This is to bring you into notice that I ordered gardasil vaccine which was delivered on 21st November 2025 for my hpv vaccination which was done on 22nd November 2025. The pharmeasy team sent a nurse for the administration of the same. It was clearly written on the injection thay it should be administered intramuscular only. But the nurse insisted and gave the vaccine subcutaneously on the tummy portion near the belly . When I contacted the nurse who was from venus superspeciality hospital , vadodara , for complaining for the same issue , she told that this is only the way we administer this vaccine to every patient please don't worry and for further any questions ask your gynaecologist.But this technique of administration is totally wrong. It was Clearly written on the injection as well as the pn pharmeasy app  that it should be given only intramuscular. And now when asked my doctor she told this dose won't be effective as it was given subcutaneously, it has to be given intramuscular for its effectiveness and she advised me to repeat the dose.
As this vaccines are very costly , not everyone can afford it. Someone's mistake can ruin someone's else's life.
Now what should I do?
Either deliver me the same vaccine without any money otherwise refund the  total amount to my original payment method at any circumstances, anyhow.

Thankyou

helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
I am writing to bring to your attention that PharmEasy services have not been functioning in Jammu for the past several months. Due to this, I have been unable to use the benefits of my Plus Membership.

It has now been over three months that no orders are being delivered in my area, which means the membership I paid for has gone completely unused. This is highly disappointing and has caused inconvenience, especially since I trusted the platform for regular purchases.

Therefore, I kindly request compensation for the unused period of my Plus Membership—either in the form of a membership extension equivalent to the lost duration or a refund of the membership amount.

I hope you will address this issue at the earliest.

Thank you.

Regards,
Upkar Khajuria

      Description:  Hi Team,

 1. 25 test strips..4 boxes and

notes.body: Hello Mahesh,      I understand your concern with regard to the discount.     Please note that we do provide up to 10% medicine/product level discount to all of our customers. The discount details can be checked while placing an order. However, I would like to inform you that we have multiple active offers updated on the app/website.     The discount displayed in the search results is part of our “Best Pricing” feature. To avail this offer, you need to apply the appropriate coupon code, which is shown at the top of the cart page during checkout.     For your future orders, you can refer to the link: https://PharmEasy.in/offers?src=header.     I am sorry to inform you that we do not have any special coupon codes for your profile.     Also, you may contact us at 99929 99929 to place an order over the phone. Moreover, kindly confirm whether you want a callback from our certified pharmacist to place an order.     Please be assured that your feedback has been duly noted and will be shared with the relevant team for future improvements.     Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Mahesh,

I understand your concern with regard to the discount.

Please note that we do provide up to 10% medicine/product level discount to all of our customers. The discount details can be checked while placing an order. However, I would like to inform you that we have multiple active offers updated on the app/website.

The discount displayed in the search results is part of our “Best Pricing” feature. To avail this offer, you need to apply the appropriate coupon code, which is shown at the top of the cart page during checkout.

For your future orders, you can refer to the link: https://PharmEasy.in/offers?src=header.

I am sorry to inform you that we do not have any special coupon codes for your profile.

Also, you may contact us at 99929 99929 to place an order over the phone. Moreover, kindly confirm whether you want a callback from our certified pharmacist to place an order.

Please be assured that your feedback has been duly noted and will be shared with the relevant team for future improvements.

Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello Manoj,      Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with regard to your order #650221850211885056-60615, I see your concern was highlighted for the missing item. I apologize for any inconvenience caused to you with your order.     As per the update received from the team, we had dispatched a sealed and fresh product for your order. However, upon receiving the return, we observed that the product was in an open-seal condition.     Please note that as per our company policy, opened or unsealed medicines cannot be accepted for return or resale. Hence, your return request has been rejected, and consequently, a refund cannot be processed.     We regret the inconvenience this may have caused and appreciate your understanding in this matter.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear Ms. Shruti Vaviya, and the PharmEasy Grievance Redressal Team,

 

I am writing in response to the email received on December 3, 2025, regarding Order ID VL7D4FB0, which denies my claim for the "On-Time or Free" (OTOF) benefit.

I strongly dispute the conclusion that I am ineligible for the OTOF offer based on the following facts:

PharmEasy Initiated the Reschedule: The email acknowledges, "your order reschedule has been done for 01/12/2025 at 10.30 AM." This rescheduling was initiated by your team because the technician could not make the original time slot, not by me, the customer.

Explicit Confirmation of Refund: During the call where your executive pre-intimated the delay and rescheduled the appointment, I was explicitly assured that the refund would be processed as per the OTOF scheme once the reports were generated.

Audio Evidence: I had a specific conversation with your support executive confirming my eligibility for the refund. This commitment from your staff is binding.

The "On-Time or Free" promise is rendered void if PharmEasy can simply reschedule at the last minute due to their own operational failure and then deny the benefit. The terms and conditions clearly cover service failures caused by the provider.

I request that you:

a) Review the internal call recordings for the date of the rescheduling call to verify the executive's commitment.

b) Honor the OTOF scheme as promised by your representative.

c) Process the 100% refund (up to ₹1500) .

 

As this initial support channel has denied my legitimate claim, I am simultaneously escalating this matter to the Grievance Officer, as CC'd above.

I expect a satisfactory resolution and a final decision within 48 business hours.

 

Sincerely,

Girish Panigrahy

9594475756

Order ID: VL7D4FB0



From: complaints@thyrocare.com

Sent: Wed, 03 Dec 2025 14:55:34

To: girishgcp@rediffmail.com

Subject: Regarding Service failure and OTOF against order id : VL7D4FB0

 


Hi Jayanti Panigrahy,

 

Greetings from PharmEasy!

 

We would like to inform you that as verified your order reschedule has been done for 01/12/2025 at 10.30 AM.

And our executive given the pre intimation that sample collection should not be done as per the time, hence order rescheduled.



We regret to inform you that we are unable to provide OTOF as per your request.



For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website, listed in the Need Help section.



Thank you for choosing Thyrocare. Have a great day ahead!



Regards, 

Shruti Vaviya

PharmEasy



2825268:2814883


--

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Re: Regarding Service failure and OTOF against order id : VL7D4FB0
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear Ms. Shruti Vaviya, and the PharmEasy Grievance Redressal Team,
 
I am writing in response to the email received on December 3, 2025, regarding Order ID VL7D4FB0, which denies my claim for the "On-Time or Free" (OTOF) benefit.
I strongly dispute the conclusion that I am ineligible for the OTOF offer based on the following facts:
PharmEasy Initiated the Reschedule: The email acknowledges, "your order reschedule has been done for 01/12/2025 at 10.30 AM." This rescheduling was initiated by your team because the technician could not make the original time slot, not by me, the customer.
Explicit Confirmation of Refund: During the call where your executive pre-intimated the delay and rescheduled the appointment, I was explicitly assured that the refund would be processed as per the OTOF scheme once the reports were generated.
Audio Evidence: I had a specific conversation with your support executive confirming my eligibility for the refund. This commitment from your staff is binding.
The "On-Time or Free" promise is rendered void if PharmEasy can simply reschedule at the last minute due to their own operational failure and then deny the benefit. The terms and conditions clearly cover service failures caused by the provider.
I request that you:
a) Review the internal call recordings for the date of the rescheduling call to verify the executive's commitment.
b) Honor the OTOF scheme as promised by your representative.
c) Process the 100% refund (up to ₹1500) .
 
As this initial support channel has denied my legitimate claim, I am simultaneously escalating this matter to the Grievance Officer, as CC'd above.
I expect a satisfactory resolution and a final decision within 48 business hours.
 
Sincerely,
Girish Panigrahy
9594475756
Order ID: VL7D4FB0

From: complaints@thyrocare.com
Sent: Wed, 03 Dec 2025 14:55:34
To: girishgcp@rediffmail.com
Subject: Regarding Service failure and OTOF against order id : VL7D4FB0
 
Hi Jayanti Panigrahy,
 
Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
We would like to inform you that as verified your order reschedule has been done for 01/12/2025 at 10.30 AM.
And our executive given the pre intimation that sample collection should not be done as per the time, hence order rescheduled.

We regret to inform you that we are unable to provide OTOF as per your request.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website, listed in the Need Help section.

Thank you for choosing Thyrocare. Have a great day ahead!

Regards, 
Shruti Vaviya
PharmEasy
